description: This file contains Python source code that demonstrates asynchronous and synchronous execution of tasks using the asyncio library and a custom Agent class. It defines async and sync functions simulating tasks, configures agents with models and tools, and executes responses.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that can execute tasks asynchronously or synchronously, configured with a model, tools, and display options.

methods.name: atask1
methods.description: Asynchronous function simulating a task with a delay, logs progress, and returns completion message.

methods.name: atask2
methods.description: Asynchronous function simulating a task with a delay, logs progress, and returns completion message.

methods.name: atask3
methods.description: Asynchronous function simulating a task with a delay, logs progress, and returns completion message.

methods.name: task1
methods.description: Synchronous function simulating a task with a delay, logs progress, and returns completion message.

methods.name: task2
methods.description: Synchronous function simulating a task with a delay, logs progress, and returns completion message.

methods.name: task3
methods.description: Synchronous function simulating a task with a delay, logs progress, and returns completion message.
